Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob red and blue loop has 18” of hard packed base . Looks like we will be skiing late into the Spring!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Another day of good classic skiing on bucks run.  Good tracks from building into woods and all the way back. Skate lane looked firm but slow the few areas I used.Better to classic in color weather.Thanks everyone at Huron Meadows.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Plenty of snow in woods and on golf course, woods was nicer, less wind. Trail was soft, easy climbing but not much speed on downhills. Only classic tracks were skier produced; it would be nice if the foot traffic would stop walking in the ski tracks.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 8 chairlifts, rope tow and the conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold and beautiful start to the ski day. The wind is light and the temperature should climb into the double digits today. The snow is in excellent condition thanks to the cold and the work of our Grooming Crew. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. to groom for night skiing. NASTAR racing on Birch Run at 12:30 today. The soup of the day is lamb stew. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. There is a USSS race on Scarface today and a High School ski meet on Scarface this evening. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
